sentences.en: And in godliness, brotherly love; and in brotherly love, love.
sentences.cn: 7在敬虔上供应弟兄相爱, 在弟兄相爱上供应爱.

sentences.en: And to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity.
sentences.cn: 彼后1:7有了 虔敬 、要加上爱弟兄的心.了爱弟兄的心、要加上爱众人的心.

sentences.en: Brotherly love is based on the experience that we all are one.
sentences.cn: 手足情爱建立在我们大家心连心、团结如一人这种经历的基础上.

sentences.en: Brotherly love is love for all human beings.
sentences.cn: 手足之爱是对全人类的爱.

sentences.en: Does not thank the brotherly opinion approve a dozen?
sentences.cn: 谢兄弟的意见是不赞成打?

sentences.en: He gave her a brief, brotherly kiss.
sentences.cn: 他像兄长般轻吻了她一下。

sentences.en: He has a very brotherly manner towards the little boys.
sentences.cn: 他像哥哥一样对待那些小男孩.

sentences.en: He has brotherly love for his younger sister.
sentences.cn: 就是说.他对他妹妹有很深的感情.

sentences.en: He was a brotherly sort of creature in his demeanour.

sentences.cn: 来十三1弟兄相爱要持久.

sentences.en: Pet. 1:7 And in godliness, brotherly love; and in brotherly love, love.
sentences.cn: 彼后一7在敬虔上供应弟兄相爱, 在弟兄相爱上供应爱.

sentences.en: The minister talked about brotherly love and faith and doing good works.
sentences.cn: 牧师大讲兄弟友爱、信任和行善.

sentences.en: The older boy gave the newcomer some brotherly advice.
sentences.cn: 那个年龄大一点的男孩给新来的孩子一些亲兄弟似的忠告.

sentences.en: Yo wassup man, don't be a prick , show me some brotherly love!
sentences.cn: 喂, 你不要这么坏吧, 表现一点兄弟情谊嘛!

words.tran_cn: 兄弟关系；手足情谊；四海之内皆兄弟的信念
兄弟的；兄弟般的；亲切的

trans.tran_cn: 兄弟的，兄弟般的，兄弟姐妹般的，情同手足的
trans.tran_en: showing feelings of kindness, loyalty etc that you would expect a brother to show
